data.actual_result: the filename is replaced by a number and the file extension is gone
data.expected_result: The attachment is sent normally in chat
data.short_description: [Huawei specific] Sending a message with a non-image file attached using the native Huawei file explorer will break the attachment
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a channel you have perms to send messages with attachments - Click the `+` button - Click the Import icon at top left - In the popup, select your native Huawei file explorer - Find a file that is NOT an image and select it (e.g PDF or ZIP files). Also works with *some* images located in a folder containing a . nomedia file. To reproduce this step you can also long press on any file or folder in your explorer and then tap "Compress" to quickly create a ZIP file - Send the message with the attachment
